sentence.Network_en: When the sun rose a hundred prismatic hues were reflected from it.
sentence.Network_cn: 太阳一出,更把它映得千变万化、异彩缤纷.

sentence.Network_en: The condition of uniaxial stress is closely approximated in prismatic bars subjected to pure axial tensile.

sentence.Network_en: We owe the discovery of prismatic spectrum to Isaac Newton.
sentence.Network_cn: 棱镜光谱的发现得归功于艾萨克·牛顿.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French prismatique, from Greek prisma 'thing sawn' (see prism)

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or resembling or constituting a prism;
2. exhibiting spectral colors formed by refraction of light through a prism;
